name: Superhumans Hoverbike Stunt
description:
Welcome to Sci Fi Super humans: Hover bike Stunts game. Futuristic Sci Fi Bike stunts mania is the No.1 extreme: hover bike game with silly and stunts action! Enter the race as you drive over a variety of unfaithful tracks while enjoying the realistic bike physics and fast-paced game play.

Become Sci Fi Champion of Hoverbike Stunts Mania:

Express ultimate hover bike thirst skills with racing bikes jumping over dangerous ramps. Sci Fi Bike Adventure is side scrolling voyage game. Play dozens of crazy missions with dangerous obstacle course with furious and hilly ramps each sensibly designed to twice the thrill.

Sci Fi has made a new breakthrough!

This superhuman bike stunts game environment is based on the sci-fi and there are three superhuman selections and multiple of Sci fi hover bikes. Select any superhuman and hover bike as per your desire & do stunts without thinking about the Sci Fi bike speed.
Nothing can be more dangerous than performing deadly hover bike stunts on a two wheel drive by putting your life at risk. Accept the stunt challenge in this acrobatic ramps jumping game with your sci fi bike and become a deadly sharp stunt master at Sci fi arena.

Drive sensibly to avoid breaking your ankle bone or rib cage as Sci fi superhuman. You should be very excited about spending your time with this stunts mania game of Futuristic Sci Fi Bike.

How to Play Sci Fi Super humans: Hover bike Stunts?

The game play is what’s quite attractive. Select Sci Fi superhuman and choose a hover bike and start the engine and dash toward the level’s end of Hover bike Stunts. Perform futuristic stunts and save yours superhuman from burning loops, ramps, race tracks and reach at destination point within time. Operating this futuristic hover bike on impossible tracks can be troublesome on these destructive extreme tricky tracks to become sci fi bike driver on impossible roads. So be prepare for impossible stunts game of superhumans.

Powerful Engine for Acceleration:

You are provided with awesome Hover bike stunt skills within this simulator game of Sci fi bike to enjoy your stunt runway bike driving at Sci Fi environment. For race and speed click the right buttons of the key and for turn click the left button of the key. Only 1 type of runway hover bike is on the impossible track. If you get crashed with any hurdle of fire ramps during playing this hover bike on impossible runway track then you will not success in your level of sci fi bike stunts Beast Game.

Features of Sci Fi Superhumans: Hoverbike Stunts:

= Futuristic 3D, HD graphics of this Hover Bikes Tracks stunt game.
= Realistic Sci Fi superhuman environment.
= Amazing 10 levels of performing impossible stunts with Hoverbike on Sci Fi arena.
= It holds burning loops, ramps and race tracks.
= Smooth and easy controls of Sci Fi hoverbike on stunts tracks.
= Show your Hover bike stunts driving skills in impossible track adventure Sci Fi bike games.

Don’t Wait to Download:

It’s time to show your real crazy Sci fi stunt ride by riding your hover bike on dangerous tracks. Can you beat all of the extreme levels in this stunt bike game with Amazing Sci fi environment? So, this is a time to prove yourself by clicking the download button of Sci Fi Superhumans: Hoverbike Stunts game.
